Title: Moment Liz Truss announced as new Tory leader - BBC News
Info: tory voters have chosen liz truss as their new leader and she will become prime minister on tuesday. as widely expected, the south west norfolk mp beat rishi sunak to become leader of her party, sir graham brady has announced. she is due to go to balmoral within 24 hours and be sworn in as the uk prime minister after boris johnson formally resigns. live: liz truss to be next uk prime minister © 2022 bbc. the bbc is not responsible for the content of external sites. read about our approach to external linking.
